greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^floor(e/p).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: Array[Times @@ Map[#1^Floor[#2/#1] & @@ # &, FactorInteger[#]] &, 105] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 12 2021 *)
program: (PARI) A342007(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(k=1, #f~, f[k, 2] = floor(f[k, 2]/f[k, 1])); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 04 2021
